item.title: Charleston Community Book Club
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: The Charleston Community Book Club is a monthly gathering open to everyone in the local area. Whether you’re an avid reader or just looking for a friendly space to connect with others and some new books, this book club is for you!

item.title: Craft and Cuppa
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: Welcome to Craft and Cuppa, where creativity meets community! We invite you to join us every Monday for a delightful crafting experience in a warm and friendly atmosphere.

item.title: Celebrate Recovery
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: Hope and healing for those facing addiction, trauma, and personal battles. We meet every Sunday at 4:30 pm.

item.title: Seniors' Lunch Club
item.author: office@charleston-church.org (Charleston Community Church)
item.description: Come join in if you’re over 60. We meet the first Wednesday of every month.
